pkgpins 0.7.0.9001
  • Reference

Purge a package's user-cache pins board

Source: R/pkgpins.gen.R
purge_cache.Rd

Deletes all objects from a package's user-cache pins board. All boards belonging to the same package as board are deleted, too.

purge_cache(board)

Arguments

board

Package's user-cache pins board.

See also

Other package cache management functions: board(), clear_cache(), ls_cache(), path_cache(), purge_caches()
